item.title: qemu/kvm guest debugging
item.description: Occasionally it is useful to debug a running guest VM’s kernel. Setup your host machine for virtual machine hosting with QEMU/KVM, and add ddebs to your host system using this wiki. Next, compile your own qemu with --enable-debug. Setup your environment to use this binary (if using libvirt), or call it directly using qemu. Ensure you have vmlinux of the L1 guest somewhere in your L0 machine. First, setup your L1 guest.
